entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
